tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    solar_energy FLOAT,
    wind_energy FLOAT,
    hydro_energy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  energy_source VARCHAR(50),
  production_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_id INT,
  source_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result VARCHAR(255)
);
